* Supports various selection options: single, multi, ...

* @return {qx.ui.form.ListItem} The found ListItem or null

raw: * Returns the index position of the given item if it is
* a child item. Otherwise it returns -1.
* This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers
* (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional
* layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid})
* ignore the children order for the layout process.
* @param child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to query for
* @return {Integer} The index position or -1 when
*   the given item is no child of this layout.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the index position of the given item if it is a child item. Otherwise it returns -1. This method works on the widget's children list. Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. Other layout manager (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.Grid}) ignore the children order for the layout process.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: child {qx.ui.core.LayoutItem} the item to query for

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The index position or -1 when the given item is no child of this layout.
@return.description: The index position or -1 when the given item is no child of this layout.

* ignore the children order for the layout process.

Some layout managers (e.g. {@link qx.ui.layout.HBox}) use the children order as additional layout information. raw: * Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no
* item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty.
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @return {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns always an array of the models of the selected items. If no item is selected or no model is given, the array will be empty. CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.data.Array} An array of the models of the selected items.

raw: * Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding
* selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be
* selected.
* *Attention:* This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)!
* *CAREFUL!* The model selection can only work if every item item in the
* selection providing widget has a model property!
* @param modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
*   selected.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes the given models in the array and searches for the corresponding selectables. If an selectable does have that model attached, it will be selected. Attention: This method can have a time complexity of O(n^2)! CAREFUL! The model selection can only work if every item item in the selection providing widget has a model property!

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
modelSelection {Array} An array of models, which should be
   selected.
